```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(microbenchmark)
library(jeksterslabRlinreg)
context("Test Residuals (e).")
```


## Parameters


```{r parameters}
n <- 100
sigma2 <- runif(
  n = 1,
  min = 9,
  max = 15
)
beta <- runif(
  n = sample(
    x = 2:5,
    size = 1
  ),
  min = 1,
  max = 3
)
Variable <- c(
  "`n`",
  "`sigma2`",
  "`beta`"
)
Description <- c(
  "Sample size ($n$).",
  "Error variance ($\\sigma^{2}_{\\epsilon}$).",
  "Regression coefficients ($\\beta$)."
)
Value <- c(
  n,
  sigma2,
  paste0(beta, collapse = ", ")
)
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Variable,
    Description,
    Value
  ),
  row.names = FALSE
)
```


## Generate Data


```{r generate_data}
X <- matrix(
  data = NA,
  nrow = n,
  ncol = length(beta)
)
for (i in 1:length(beta)) {
  if (i == 1) {
    X[, i] <- rep(
      x = 1,
      times = n
    )
  } else {
    X[, i] <- runif(
      n = n,
      min = -5,
      max = 5
    )
  }
}
y <- X %*% beta + rnorm(
  n = n,
  sd = sqrt(sigma2)
)
```


## Calculate Residuals


```{r estimate}
lm_object <- lm(
  y ~ X[, -1]
)
results_e_lm <- residuals(
  lm_object
)
results_My <- My(
  y = y,
  M = NULL,
  X = X,
  P = NULL
)
M <- M(
  X = X,
  P = NULL
)
results_My_M <- My(
  y = y,
  M = M,
  X = NULL,
  P = NULL
)
results_y_minus_yhat <- y_minus_yhat(
  y = y,
  yhat = NULL,
  X = X,
  betahat = NULL
)
yhat <- Py(
  y = y,
  P = NULL,
  X = X
)
results_y_minus_yhat_yhat <- y_minus_yhat(
  y = y,
  yhat = yhat,
  X = NULL,
  betahat = NULL
)
results_e <- e(
  X = X,
  y = y,
  betahat = NULL
)
results_linreg <- invisible(
  linreg(
    X = X,
    y = y,
    FUN = betahat_inv,
    output = c("coef", "model", "anova")
  )
)
results_e_linreg <- results_linreg$e
```


## Summarize Results


```{r results}
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Case = 1:nrow(X),
    lm = results_e_lm,
    My = results_My,
    My_M = results_My_M,
    y_minus_yhat = results_y_minus_yhat,
    y_minus_yhat_yhat = results_y_minus_yhat_yhat,
    e = results_e,
    e_linreg = results_e_linreg
  ),
  row.names = FALSE
)
```


## Benchmarking


```{r benchmark}
microbenchmark(
  lm = residuals(lm(y ~ X[, -1])),
  My = My(y, M = NULL, X = X, P = NULL),
  My_M = My(y = y, M = M, X = NULL, P = NULL),
  y_minus_yhat = y_minus_yhat(y = y, yhat = NULL, X = X, betahat = NULL),
  y_minus_yhat_yhat = y_minus_yhat(y = y, yhat = yhat, X = NULL, betahat = NULL),
  e = e(X = X, y = y, betahat = NULL)
)
```


## testthat


```{r testthat_01, echo=TRUE}
test_that("My, y_minus_yhat, and e return the same values as residuals(lm())", {
  expect_equivalent(
    round(
      x = results_e_lm,
      digits = 2
    ),
    round(
      x = results_My,
      digits = 2
    ),
    round(
      x = results_y_minus_yhat,
      digits = 2
    ),
    round(
      x = results_y_minus_yhat_yhat,
      digits = 2
    ),
    round(
      x = results_e,
      digits = 2
    ),
    round(
      x = results_e_linreg,
      digits = 2
    )
  )
})
```



```{r testthat_02, echo=TRUE}
test_that("expect_error", {
  expect_error(
    y_minus_yhat(
      y,
      yhat = NULL,
      X = NULL,
      betahat = NULL
    )
  )
})
```
